articles.title: Nebraska defensive coordinator Erik Chinander fired after 35-point loss to Oklahoma - ESPN
articles.description: Nebraska fired defensive coordinator Erik Chinander on Sunday, a day after his unit allowed 49 points and 580 yards in a loss to Oklahoma.
articles.content:
Nebraska fired defensive coordinator Erik Chinander on Sunday, a day after his unit allowed 49 points and 580 yards in a 49-14 loss to Oklahoma.
